text:
Encodia | Bioinformatics Scientist | San Diego | Full-time | ONSITE

Encodia is an early stage biotech company developing the next generation of protein analysis tools. We're looking to expand our bioinformatics team (current population: 1). Responsibilities will include developing algorithms to analyze new kinds of genomic and proteomic data, as well as building data, analysis and visualization pipelines and infrastructure.

You can apply online at https://encodia.workable.com/jobs/771712
